channel.title: Data Scientist on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Data Scientist on Memo Tut

item.title: Recommended competition sites for data scientists
item.description: We have gathered competition sites to help career development of those who aim to be data scientists. #Kaggle It is a famous site in the data scientist community. It is written as Kaggle and read as “Kaguru”. Data scientists from all over the world compete here every day. Google acquired it on March 8, 2017. I want to request an analysis Major companies are winning the prize money, and in the past, competitions were held by Mercari and Recruit.
